metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugins for Go development and task delegation

plugins.name: codex
plugins.description: Delegate tasks to OpenAI Codex agent via browser automation

plugins.name: orca-arch
plugins.description: Architecture guidance for the Orca MCP server project

plugins.name: go-dedup
plugins.description: Analyze and consolidate duplicate Go code identified by jscpd

plugins.name: go-error-hygiene
plugins.description: Fix Go error handling lint issues: err113, wrapcheck, errorlint

plugins.name: go-filesize
plugins.description: Manage large Go source files and plan strategic splits

plugins.name: go-lintbrush
plugins.description: Fix Go complexity and style issues: gocyclo, funlen, godot

plugins.name: go-security-lint
plugins.description: Fix Go security lint issues: gosec G115, G404

plugins.name: go-test-architect
plugins.description: Create comprehensive Go test suites following ADR-008 conventions
